articles.author: Patrick Hipes
articles.title: Fox Sports’ Mark Sanchez Now Charged With Felony After Stabbing Incident In Indianapolis - Deadline
articles.description: Prosecutors in Indianapolis have added a felony battery charge in the ongoing case of ex-USC quarterback and current Fox Sports analyst Mark Sanchez.
articles.content: Prosecutors in Indianapolis have added a felony battery charge in the ongoing case of Mark Sanchez, the former NFL and USC quarterback and current Fox Sports analyst who was stabbed over the weekend … [+2525 chars]
